div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene xxvij die Januarij anno
quo supra

the samyn day the ballieis continevit the action' debatabile betuix
Dauid menyes eldar and lindesay herralde anent the oppin of certan'
preuis to monunday that next cumis for waknes of the court but
preiudice of party

the saide day Richerde barnis grantit him borghe' for j boll
of meile to Williamso andirson' James sone quhilkis the balyeis
chargit him to pay within terme of law

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem pennul
timo die Januarij Anno quo supra

the samyn day lindesay harralde and Alexander huchonson' has bundin and oblyst
be the fathtis of thar bodiis thar handis vphaldin coniunctlie and Seueralie
renunciand the benefice of diuision' to Dauid menyeis eldar to pay him ane barrel
and demi of Salmond' merchand' gude at the next lammes nochtwithstandinge
gif thai pay the said' Dauid xxxiij s' and iiij d' be this next pasche thai
ar dischargit of j barrel of the said' Salmond' And' in likuis' gif thai
content him xvj and viij d' within xx dais eftir the next Witsonday thai salbe
dischargit of the said' demi barrel salmond'

the saide day Androw ewinson' was dischargit of the borghe' strekit be
Will balheluy vpon him quhil he be now followit

The saide day Dauid' Androw steuart follouit William gareauche eldar for the wrang
uis' haldin fra him of xij crownis and thre gudlinthtis quhilkis was put
to ane assis' quhilkis riplie avisit and suorne deliuerit and fand' the said' William
quyt of the said' challance be the moutht of Androw branche

The samyn day Robert blinsele prelocutor for mariory traile Solemptlie
protestit quhat the ballieis did' anent hir fee and heretage suld' turne
hir to nay preiudice
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio tercio die februarij Anno quo supra

the samyn day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane suorne assis'
Williame portar forspekar that Androw Waus is avand' to sere Dauid
Waus vicar of banf tua markis of maile of j croft and xx s'
of grissome for the samyn croft of the termes bigan the quhilk
philp Dunbrek officiar at commavnd' of the balyeis chargit the said'
androw to pay within terme of law

Eodem die Willelmus lammynton conuictus fuit per assisam pro perturbio
Alexandri prat in verbo cui emendabit ut Jura voluit Et dictus
alexander quitus de cla perturbio dicti Willelmi

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxmo die februarij anno
quo supra

Eodem die Relicta quondam Johannis cathnes fecit constituit creauit et
ordinauit Alexandrum chamer Juniorem et Andream Culane seniorem coniunctim
et diuisim suos legittimos procuratores ad petendum exigendum et recipiendum annuum
redditum xvj s' et viij d' sibi annuatim debit' de terra Willelmj moir' et In
omnibus aliis actionibus controuersiis et querelis ipsam concernentibus Et
de receptis acquitand' promitten' de Rato et grato in vberiore
forma procuratorij cum omnibus clausulis ad procuratorium necessariis et oportunis

the saide day Katherin buchane grantit awand' to Androw litstar
xlvij s' of maile for the hous' scho and hir husbande Inhabitis and for
vthir thingis betuix thame quhilk the ballieis chargit hir to pay
within terme of law

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvijo
die februarij Anno quo supra

the saide day Williame cardnow was in amerciament of the court
be his tounge graunt for the wranguis' strubulance of canny
nicholsone and to Amend' as law will and forbeir in tyme to cum
and for the mendis of the saide strubulance it was ordanit and deliuerit
be ane suorne assis' Jonhne colisone forspekar that the saide William
sal pay to the saide canny xx s' tharof v s' in continent and the remanent
of the said' xx s' at the will of the saide assis' Ande gif euir
he beis conuikit for strubulance in tyme to cum he sal pay xl s'
to Sanct nicholes' werke vnforgevin Ande falyeinge he has
nocht samekile gudis he salbe pvnist in his persone or ellis expellit
out of the towne

the saide day Duncane Straloche and Androu nachty officiaris at commaund'
of the ballieis arrestit ale the gudis pertening to Williame of buchane sone
and ayr to vmquhile robert of buchane beinge within his loft in the
castalgate Ande in his butht in the gallougate forbedinge in our Soueran
lordis naymez aldirman and ballieis that nay persone nor personis Intromett
with thame vnto the tyme Androu Culane yongar be freid' and releuit
of ane last of Salmond' that he is bundin for the said' William
to the bischope of Abirdene witnes Jhon' colisone Jhon' Wormet thomas prat
and James colison'
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem ixo die marcij Anno quo supra

Eodem die Andreas litstar conuictus fuit per assisam pro perturbio Johannis
litstar Et Idem Andreas conuictus per assisam pro perturbio dicti Andree
et quilibet alteri emendabit ut Jura volunt

the samyn day it was fundin deliuerit and ordanit be ane assis'
Robert blinsele forspekar that gif euir the said' Androw committis sic
strubulance in tyme to Cum and beis conuikit tharin he sal pay tene
markis to Sanct nicholes' werk vnforgevin And' gif euir the saide
Jonhne committis sic strubulance and beis conuikit he sal pay v merkis to
the said' werk vnforgevin

div.head: Nomina assise ad Inquisicionem
div.p:
Robertus blinsele thomas prat Walterus auchneywe Jacobus colison
Willelmus Kintor Willelmus andirson thomas Waus Alexander traile and Dauid
spens Jurati dicunt quod quondam Willelmus chamer auunculus Elizibeth' Strachin
latricis presencium obiit vlimo vestitus et sasitus vt de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri
Regis de vna terra Jacente infra dictum burgum ex in vico furcarum ex occidentali parte
eiusdem vici inter terram Jacobi colison ex australi ex vna et terram patricij adamson
ex boreali partibus ex altera et communionem viam regiam versus oriens extendens
ad lacum dicti burgi versus occidens Ac de quadam terra siue paruo crofto
Jacente ex occidentali parte eiusdem inter terras Johannis colisone tam ex australi quam
boreali partibus Et quod dicta Elizibeth' est vna legittima et propinquior heredum
quondam dicti annuali suj de dictis terris Et quod est legittime etatis et valent
per annuum xiij s' et iiij d' Et tantum valuerunt tempore pacis Et tenetur
in capite de Suppremo domino nostro rege per servicium burgagium et nunc
existunt in manibus dicti nostri Regis per duos tres menses aut eocirca in
defectu veri heredis Jus suum minime prosequentis

div.head: Nomina assise ad Inquisicionem Alexandri Symsone xijo die marcij
div.p:
Dominus Johannes ruthirfurd Alexander menyeis Johannes colisone Alexander rede
Alexander mar Willelmus Kintor Jacobus colison Johannes Wormet gilbertus mure
son' henricus hourum et Johannes portar Jurati dicunt quod quondam Willelmus simson'
frater germanus Alexandri symsone latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus
vt de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de vna terra Jacente
infra dictum burgum in vico castri ex australi parte eiusdem vici inter terram Alexandri
menyeis ex orientali ex vna et terram Willelmj goldsmitht ex occidentali partibus
ex altera et torrentem Sancte trinitatis versus austrum et terram anteriorem quondam
Jacobi leslie versus boriam Et quod dictus Alexander est legittimus et propinquior
heres quondam dicti Alexandri Willelmj fratris suj de dicta terra Et quod est legittime etatis
et valet per annum xl s' et tantum valuit tempore pacis Et tenetur in capite de
Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium et nunc existit in manibus
dominj nostri Regis per spacium dimidij annj aut eocirca in defectu veri heredis
Jus suum minime prosequentis

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvjo die marcij Anno
quo supra

add.foreign: dominus J ruthirfurd' In domo consulum

div.p:
the samyn day sere Jhone ruthirfurd' of tarlane knicht deliuerit Sex li'
In gold' In presence of the balyeis and the consell to sere Jonhne stiruelinge
to be deliuerit to Androw Culane yongar the balye in the contentacione and
assithtment for the Interchange of ane half nethis fischinge of the Rak
with and for ane demi nethis fischinge of the mydchingile the quhilk demi
nethis of mydchingile the saide knicht has in the generale assedacion
last maid' the quhilkis demi nethis fischinge of the midchingile the said'
knicht assignit to the saide Androw renunciand ale richt and clame of right
that he has or may haue in and to the saide demi nethis fischinge of
the midchingile with the pertinence for al the termes that he has or may
haue tharof for the Interchange of demi nethis fischingis of the raike to be
maid' to the saide knicht eftir the tenor' of the contrake maid' betuix
tham obefore And' the commone Sele salbe gevin herapon' to the said' partiis
Androw and in continent the said knicht renuncit al thir thingis forsaid' becaus' he
was nocht present to fulfill the contrak and tuk the said' Sex li' agan

Cura Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio tercio die
Aprilis Anno Domini et cetera nonogesimo secundo

the said' day Williame quelp present ane letter of our Souerane lordez vndir
the priue Sele to the balyeis exhortinge and requiringe the aldirman balyeis
consal and communite of Abirdene to sett ane demi nethis fischingis of Done to him
and cristiane turinge his spous' quhilkis lettres with reuerence as efferis
resavit rede and vndirstandin the saide Williame askit at the ballieis
ansuer' herapone the balyes avisitlie schew that the aldirman and mast part
of consal and communite was nocht present for that tyme and at the hame cumyn'
of the aldirman thai suld' caus' the consal and communite forgethir and gif ane
ansuer' to our Souerane lordis lettres as efferis becaus' the said' letter
was direct to the aldirman balyeis consale and communite thai coud'
nocht gif ansuer tharto but thar avis'

the saide day the mast part of the consale grantit ij burges to be
chosin and maid' to sere Jonhne Strachin chaplane for his gude
seruice to be done and continevit within the paris' kirk of abirdene
for this yer to Cum quhilkis ij burges that ples' him to cheis
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xiij die marcij Anno quo supra

the said' day comperit Jonhne Steuarte befor the aldirman and balyeis
and said' that thar was a state gevin to Wat auchneywe and James
colisone of a land' pertening to his sone and the saide state is nocht of
vale as he said' for his sone is of lyve and forthir he tuk j
Instrument of sere Jhone Stiruelinge notar public' witnes Alexander
menyes William blinsele Dauid' prat thomas Jameson philp
Dunbrek with vthir diuers'

the said' day Dauid' Duffous' grantit him avand' xxij s' and
vj d' to Androw Waus of his hyer the quhilkis the ballieis chargit
him to pay within terme of law

The saide day thir personis vndir writin that is to say margaret balcromy
canny ruthirfurd' the wif of Will Wricht the wif of gilbert mo
resone margaret ramsay the nurys' of Alexander mar' the vyf of henry
lorne the wif of Jhone chamer the wif of Jhone andirsone
In the grene mady baxtar the wif of lemmane the wif of
henry crage the wif of morice talyoure the wif of Alexander
talyour the wif of Androw hall the wif of Will scrimgeour the wif thomas
glenmaluyn the nuryce of g William goldsmitht the wif of
Will leches Cristiane mortymer maly fethirneire the wif of Dauid'
Dow the wif of Jok lipe the wife of Wat mernys Jonet club
maly skynnar the wif of Eduard' top megy berklat the wif
of george Dys' and Emy Kennarty ar conuikit be ane suorne assis'
for the spillinge of the mercat and brekinge of commone ordinance
to the dampnage and skath of the towne and Ilkan In Amerciament of the courte
be the moutht of androw branche and it was ordanit be the
said' assis' that the said' personis be expellit the mercat fra meile
byinge quhile michaelmes day vndir the payne of law
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio xvj die aprilis anno quo supra

the samyn day the aldirman chargit the ballieis to rede the lande liand'
in the gallowgate to William philp quhilkis he bocht fra Alexander rollande
and caus' him be obeit tharintill eftir the tenor' of his chartir

div.head: Nomina ad Inquisicionem Agnetis lammyntone
div.p:
Alexander rede Andreas branche alexander mar' Walterus auchneywe Willelmus portar
Willelmus andirsone Johannes thomsone Dauid prat Alexander gray Willelmus futhes
Andreas murray senior thomas mar Willelmus blinsele et Dauid mar' Quj
Jurati dicunt quod agnes lammyngtone est legittima et propinquior heres quondam
Johannis Dauisone auj suj Et quod non sunt terre neque annuj Redditus

the samyn day the aldirman and balyeis assignit the law day eftir pasche to Will
philp and the wif of Alexander rolland' to comper befor tham bringand' with thame
the richtis that thai haue and will vys' anent the land' that scho duellis in and
ordanit thomas Jameson seriand' to warne the said' wif befor witnes to comper
the said' day and to arrest the gudis beinge within the hous' that thai may
do Justice to batht the said' partiis as efferis

the saide day Androw lammyntone grantit to pay vj s' g' to the outquitinge
of Sanct nicholes' baltkin at the Salinge of the next schip with merchandice
out of the port of Abirdene cumand' in h'h' overwrites 'z'.olande zeland' or flandris sayflie with
thar gudis

the saide day Robert crage was quyt be ane assis' William blinsele
forspekar of the forstallinge of the burghe' of woll and skinnis

the saide day the assis' ordanit Robert crage to mak gude befor the balyeis
one the law day next eftir pasche that the larde of tolly In the yer' of nynty
yeris was his merchande Ande was his merchand' the yer' thareftir Ande gif
he falyeis in his preyf the saide day thai fande that the saide robert wrangit
In the byinge of the woll fra the larde of tolly

Burgenses et fratres gilde tempore prepositure Johannis Culane Anno
Domini millesimo quadringentesimo nonogesimo primo

Robertus futhes recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento racione
paternitatis et Solut' v s' in alba bursa

Thomas hale textor recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito Juramento
solut' x s'

Andreas alexandersone recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito Juramento
et Solut' xiiij s'

Thomas geracht ad instanciam nobilis viri Arthuri forbes de reres
recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito Juramento

Adam Culan Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
solut' quinque s' in alba bursa et prestito Solito Juramento

Robertus swyntone fullo recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito Juramento
et solut' x s'

franciscus Culan Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
prestito solito Juramento et Solut' quinque s' in alba bursa

Alexander ranisone recipitur in liberum burgensem Jure paternitatis et solut' quinque s' in alba
bursa et prestito solito Juramento

Walterus gareauche recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito
Juramento et solut' xvj s'

Petrus futhes recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde quia sponsavit
filiam burgensis et solut' xiij s' et iiij d' et prestito solito Juramento
forstallatores tempore prepositure Johannis culan Anno Domini et cetera nonogesimo primo

Magnus galt recipitur conuictus fuit per assisam pro forestacioneforestallacione burgi in empcione
pellium cuj precipitur emendare ut Jura volunt et cetera

Johannes broune conuictus per confessionem propriam pro forestallacione burgi in empcione
pellium

the xvj day of aprile In presence of Jonhne menyes Androw mureson' oblist
him be the fatht of his body his hande vphaldin to pay the aldirman
four' li' scottis money at Witsonday next to cum Ande falyeinge tharof
to pay tua barrellis of Salmonde gude and sufficient merchande gude
at the next mydsommir' for j boyt bocht fra him And' Jhone fechat of the key
oblist him be his hand' and gudis to freth' the said' Androw tharanent

The said' day William moir fand' j borghe' in the hande of Androw
nachty seriand' of the court that philpe of Dunbrek wranguislie
withhalde fra him fiwe eln' of eln the quhilkis the saide philpe
denyit Ande in continent the saide actione was putt to the decision'
of ane assis' of the personis forsaide quhilkis riplie avisit the
gret bodely aithe suorne deliuerit be the moutht of William
blinsell the said' borghe' of nayne of availe and the said'
philp quyt of his clame and challance of the said' lawne
And' this gevin for devme be the moutht of Jhone Williamson'
dempstar of the courte
